text:
@toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock At this stage no. 

Who'd they get that BJ/Cummings would accept & who'd do any better?
The gov has made 3 dreadful errors that have almost certainly cost lives.

Lack of prep.
Initial herd immunity.
Failing care homes.

Started (v late) to be adequate. No point in changing now.
